mapper.select: SELECT POS_CODE, POS_NAME, POS_USE, POS_NOTE, POS_REGM, POS_REGD FROM POS WHERE POS_CODE=#{posCode}

SELECT POS_CODE, POS_NAME, POS_USE FROM POS WHERE 1=1
AND POS_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS_USES LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY POS_CODE ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM POS WHERE 1=1
AND POS_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND POS_USES LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
